entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
BREEZY AND NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH, DIMINISHING TO 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
